greeting: Hello. Welcome to Food Finder YYC!

askDay.text:
Are you looking for food for
(1)today or (2)tomorrow?

askLocationType.text:
How would you like to tell us your location?
(1)address
(2)intersection
(3)place

askIntersection1.text: Please tell me the full name of the first street at the intersection.

askIntersection2.text: Please tell me the full name of the second street at the intersection.

askPlace.text: What place are you close to?

goodbye: Thank you for using Food Finder YYC!
